basics.name: Daniel Gomm
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: PhD Student at Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica and the University of Amsterdam

work.name: Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica
work.summary: Researching at the intersection of generative AI, structured data, and information retrieval.

work.name: Joint Research Center, European Commission
work.summary: Scientific trainee at the European Center for Algorithmic Transparency (ECAT).
highlights: Researching agentic approaches for auditing algorithmic systems.

work.name: Intel
work.summary: Work on System Trace tool; software tooling for (pre-production) silicon debugging and tracing

work.name: FZI Research Center for Information Technology
work.summary: Work on open-source industrial IoT stream processing toolbox Apache StreamPipes
highlights: Integration of findings from bachelor thesis into Apache StreamPipes
Enabling the dynamic re-distribution of computing workloads across distributed infrastructure

work.name: Robert Bosch GmbH
work.summary: Supporting the management of the development for IT projects with data-driven insights
highlights: Development of automatic classification tool for part numbers

work.name: Karlsruhe Institute of Technology
work.position: Tutor for basic and advanced lectures in Java programming
work.summary: Holding theoretical and hands-on lessons for groups of 15-25 students

volunteer.summary: Project lead for the "unwrapped" project, aiming to establish a local, emission-free, zero-waste grocery delivery system.

courses: Master Thesis that proposes novel explanation methods for Temporal Graph Neural Networks based on counterfactuals
Bachelor Thesis on dynamic re-distribution of computing operations in stream processing pipelines across edge and cloud nodes

publications.name: CoDy: Counterfactual Explainers for Dynamic Graphs
Counterfactual Explanations for Black-Box Models on Dynamic Graphs
Adapting Stream Processing Pipelines in Fog Infrastructures
